node.display_long_description:
2020 Winner of Best VR Meditation App by Men's Health and VR Fitness Insider! 

TRIPP improves well-being through daily meditations, personalized experiences and trackable mindfulness journeys.  TRIPP uniquely integrates game play mechanics, breathing exercises, beautiful visual landscapes and sound frequencies. Based on scientific research and used in several clinical studies, TRIPP helps manage stress and even trigger awe, so that you become healthier - inside and out.  

-Receive daily Focus and Calm TRIPPs
-Compose your own TRIPPs
-Access 40+ meditative experiences with regular new additions
-Personalize your experiences with the TRIPP mobile app
-Track your progress through the TRIPP mobile app
 
Demo a Focus TRIPP session for FREE today!  Monthly membership to TRIPP is $4.99. Cancel at any time. Lifetime access to TRIPP as in-app purchase for $29.99. Go to tripp.com for more details.

nodes.title: NEW Volume Preferences
nodes.body_text:
You can now customize your audio levels in the Focus, Calm, and Composer experiences by music, meditation voice-over, and sound effects. Audio levels are set and saved separately by each experience type (Focus, Calm, and Composer).

When you pause your TRIPP experience (by squeezing the right trigger on the Oculus controller), look for the new "Audio Levels" settings option.
Please note: Volume controls are not yet available for experiences in the full TRIPP catalog of content (meditate, learn, escape, ascend).

We are continuously working to optimize your TRIPP experience with new features. We appreciate you and welcome your feedback!

nodes.title: Achievements are LIVE in TRIPP!
nodes.body_text:
Data show the greatest benefits from using TRIPP come with regular and consistent practice. To help challenge you to meet your goals, we’ve just launched achievements. As you TRIPP, unlock badges to be rewarded for your progress.

There are 12 badges, and the more you TRIPP, the more you earn. You can view your completed achievements on your Oculus profile. We hope you enjoy this new feature, and as always, please let us know what you think. We appreciate you!

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
Pros:
- Awsom creativity ! Please keep it up 
- Astonishing VR 3D Space and planettes. Please make more like these! Especially when they are moving/orbiting slowly with casted shadows. 
- The narrative text is mindfully written and every day talks about a different psycological or personal development topic. I like the variety !
- There are two types of approaches, calm and a kind of exercice. 
- VR 3D vidéos: my total respect to mr. Zimmmerman, Waw! Are they more?
- Everyday, There is a brand new scène that we discover.
- Updates : we can revisit previous mediations.

Cons: 
- Even if there is a remarkable improvment in terms of customising the today's tripp (A big Thank you), the customisation is still limited by eliminating trully free choices to what is listed only. So I won't call it 100% free customisation, since there is no AI involved, and it's basically picking up an old meditation 3d videos mixed with an audio file.
- Customer service doesn't respond to new ideas emails or suggestions. I've sent 3 emails to them, no response. I still have a complete respect to the Tripp team for what they are bringing to the world, but there is always room for improvment, and customer service no matter what, should be a top priority.
- There is 1 single female voice and 1 single male voice. Personally, with time, after using the app for months, I feel I need to hear different voices than the 2 only that are listed. I don't like them both and it prevents me even to focuse on the meditation itself.
I've sent multiple times requests of providing more voices choices but nothing has changed on that regards. 
- Some vidéos have long fast-flashing scenes that seriousely mug our eyes, our brain and I am really surprised how they are included in such nice meditation app. Please remove them! They hurt our eyes !

website_page_meta.description:
2020 Winner of Best VR Meditation App by Men's Health and VR Fitness Insider, TRIPP improves how you feel.  Based on scientific research and used in several clinical studies, TRIPP helps to manage stress and keep you healthy... inside and out.

Try a FREE TRIPP session today. For new daily meditations, customized experiences, and trackable mindfulness journeys, unlock the premium service through a one-time purchase or low cost subscription plans.
